document.full_text: sources say that nicki minaj is in discussions -- but not confirmed -- to support britney spears on the latter's upcoming tour after enrique iglesias abruptly pulled out hours after the tour was announced.
document.title: nicki minaj in talks to join britney spears tour
lines_and_colors: sources say that nicki minaj is in discussions -- but not confirmed -- to support britney spears on the latter's upcoming tour after enrique iglesias abruptly pulled out hours after the tour was announced.
